title: Huawei Watch_How many phones can I connect to the watch? How do I pair my watch with my phone?
answer:
Your watch can only be paired with one phone at any one time.

If you wish to pair your watch with another phone, you must restore your watch to the factory settings first.

You can pair your phone with several watches. Touch the upper left corner in the Android Wear app, select Pair with a new watch, and then follow the onscreen instructions to pair your phone with a new watch.
